title: Millionaire YouTuber Hank Green tells Gen Z to rethink their Tesla bets—and shares the portfolio changes he’s making to avoid AI-bubble fallout
description: The S&P 500’s record concentration in AI-focused companies like Nvidia, Microsoft, and Google could bear bad news in the event of a bubble pop, says YouTuber Hank Green.

title: Elon Musk says Tesla owners will soon be able to text while driving, despite it being illegal in nearly all 50 states
description: Safety experts say sending texts behind the wheel of a full self-driving Tesla would completely undermine the automated features the vehicle has in place.

title: Elon Musk says Tesla FSD lets you text while being driven. I tried it. Here's what happened.
description: A hands-on review confirms the FSD system allows texting, even through tricky traffic.

title: Elon Musk says Tesla FSD will let you use your phone in some cases. Police say don't do that.
description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk said Full Self-Driving now allows drivers to text and drive in certain traffic conditions. Police advise against it.

title: Subaru, BMW top Consumer Reports' top auto brands; Toyota named most reliable, with Tesla most improved
description: Consumer Reports named Subaru the top brand in its 2026 Overall Brand Report Card for the second year in a row, with BMW the runner-up, though the German brand scored highest in the luxury category.

title: GM has hired a former Tesla exec in its revived self-driving push
description: Ronalee Mann, who previously worked as a strategy and operations manager at Cruise, recently joined GM as head of product operations, BI has learned.

title: Tesla reviewer breaks down the price of owning an EV versus a gas car in the US: 'Real costs after one year [of] ownership'
description: Carmen's breakdown and comparison are helpful for drivers on the fence.

title: Driver of Tesla that went airborne in deadly Southern California crash identified
description: The 37-year-old man who was driving a speeding Tesla Model 3 that caused a deadly multi-vehicle crash in Huntington Beach was identified by authorities on Wednesday. The Tesla driver, who was the lone fatality in Tuesday’s crash, was identified as Huntington Beach resident Ryan Mark Larson by the Orange County Sheriff’s Department. A dashcam video […]

title: ‘Big Short’ investor Michael Burry revives his short bet against  Tesla, calling the stock ‘ridiculously overvalued’
description: Burry first shorted Tesla in 2021 but exited the trade months later.

title: Elon Musk has started work toward his $1 trillion Tesla pay package. But 2 loopholes foreshadow how it could be a bust for shareholders
description: Musk's comp package incentivizes him to hype the stock, then deliver just enough on the basic business end to clinch a rich reward.

title: Tesla loses some AI staff to a new robotics startup
description: Sunday Robotics came out of stealth mode last week and revealed a team stocked with Tesla alumni.

title: Tech CEOs can't stop talking about data centers in space
description: Google CEO Sundar Pichai wants an AI chip "somewhere in space" in 2027. "Maybe we'll meet a Tesla Roadster," he quipped.

title: These are Some of the Worst Cars Ever Sold in America
description: The American automotive landscape has seen some incredible success stories, from the Ford Model T to the Tesla Model S. But for every triumph, there have been vehicles that taught the industry valuable lessons about ... Read more

title: Elon Musk says that in 10 to 20 years, work will be optional and money will be irrelevant thanks to AI and robotics
description: “It’ll be like playing sports or a video game or something like that,” the Tesla CEO said.

title: Tesla's robotaxi clears a key hurdle in Nevada
description: Tesla has completed the self-certification process at Nevada's DMV, so it now needs commercial approval for a robotaxi rollout.

title: Sequoia Capital partner Shaun Maguire shares 3 ways to succeed at one of Elon Musk's companies
description: Maguire, who has led investments in several Musk companies, named another tech leader that reminds him of the Tesla CEO.
